member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder
member.summary: Creates the theme specific-look for headers in .NET Framework 4.5 .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsClickable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header is clickable.
member.returns: true if the header clickable; otherwise, false. The registered default is true. For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsClickableProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsHovered
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header appears as if the mouse pointer is moved over it.
member.returns: true if the header appears as if the mouse pointer is moved over it; otherwise, false. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsHoveredProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsPressed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header appears pressed.
member.returns: true if the header appears pressed; otherwise, false. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsPressedProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsSelected
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the header appears selected.
member.returns: true if the header appears selected; otherwise, false. The registered default is false. For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.IsSelectedProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the header renders in the vertical direction, as a column header, or horizontal direction, as a row header.
member.returns: One of the enumeration values that indicates which direction the header renders. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.OrientationProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that draws the separation between headers.
member.returns: The brush that draws the separation between headers. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorBrushProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorVisibility
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the separation between headers is visible.
member.returns: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether the is visible. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SeparatorVisibilityProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the dependency property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.Themes.DataGridHeaderBorder.SortDirection
member.summary: Gets or sets the header sort direction.
member.returns: One of the enumeration values that indicates which direction the column is sorted. The registered default is null. For more information about what can influence the value, see .
